titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule to modify the tariffs on certain wrist watches, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/15/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the duty treatment of certain wrist watches. Applies to such watches the same staged rate reductions accorded certain other watches.
